Description.Text: Alghero City is a friendly 4-star hotel offering stylish accommodation in the heart of Alghero. Highlights include a bar, free Wi-Fi and an excellent location close to the marina. Alghero is a charming town with a rich history and distinctive Catalan character. Nearby places of interest include Alghero Cathedral, Bousquet Promenade, the marina and the beach. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Alghero destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise property. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 17sqm and decorated in a bright, rustic style with pastel tones and handmade local fabrics. Amenities include a mini-bar, air-conditioning and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The pizzeria offers delicious Sardinian and Italian dishes in a relaxed and friendly setting. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the stylish hotel bar. The hotel has a 24-hour reception and offers a chargeable airport shuttle service. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
